column4: guys what could be the problem, that wireless keeps disconnecting every ~10secs?
the signal is very good
: maybe your laptop?
hm but he worked before an hour
: my hp compaq sometimes goes crazy and mutes or adjusts voice itsely, or you can see the screen mode switch between normal mode and presentation mode
: I have tihs problem in windows, though
: did your try the traditional way? resetting?
I tried to restart the laptop, but that didn't help
: what about if you only use command line to use wireless
what u mean?
: ah... this is another story then
: I thougt, it may be some application that may cause you to connect/disconnect. so, thought it may help to use terminal login only
that could be, because I've been trying to install xfce, lxde etc today
: https://help.ubuntu.com/11.04/ubuntu-help/net-wireless-disconnecting.html
: the link is crap....leave it!
none of these should be problem, because it started doing it before an hour or so
: I suggest leaving X out for login, and try like that
what you mean?
: just try command line login
what for?
: any possible modules/apps coming with XFCE that causes the problem
I'm running now unity but I still got the problem
